document_data.name: Vor Thomil
document_data.mainbody: '''Vor Thomil''' was a realm within the [[Feywild]] that was connected to [[Oman's Isle]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Inhabitants: Vor Thomil was ruled by [[fomorian]]s, the Queen of which was [[Connomae]].
document_data.Activities: Excursions from Vor Thomil to Oman's Isle were quite common as Queen Connomae wanted to capture a great number of slaves to use to assault the city of [[Shinaelestra]] in the Feywild.
